attributes.action: Leave the Christmas lights on until the end of January to cheer up Londoners
attributes.background: 2020 has been one of the most awful years in British history. The gorgeous Xmas lights have the power to make people smile, forget about troubled times, dream for a second & cheer us up. The pandemic is unfortunately far from being over but the lights are a great natural remedy against gloomy days.

rejection.details: Decisions about Christmas lights are a matter for individual local authorities and businesses, not the Government or House of Commons.
